page.title: 10Local News
page.content: {TRAVELLERS BRING PROTESTS Regional Councillor for Rockwell and Fairmuir, Mr Richard Black has written to the Lord Advocate protesting at the numbers of travelling people who have arrived at a site in his constituency. He has asked the Lord Advocate either to have them removed or to provide his constituents with an explanation as to why they have been allowed to camp on the site of the old Isolation Hospital at Macalpine Road. {REBUILDING AT CAMPERDOWN Dundee District Council is to promote a Manpower Services Commission project to rebuild 200 metres of boundary wall at Camperdown Park.Costs are estimated at Â£63,000. {REDUNDANCIES AT TIMEX } Timex today announced another 400 redundancies from their workforce. A sad blow for Dundee.
